name: Fields of Force
description:
In this game, you try to reach the goal by using special fields to your advantage. While these fields take your control away, they also remove the forces of Gravity itself. Reach places that you can't reach otherwise, but avoid spikes that are scattered all over the place.

Known Bugs

The Player likes to get stuck when you slowly walk off an Edge. So don't do that, I guess.

Controls

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys: Move your player
Space: Jump
F1: Show/Hide FPS Counter
